data.text: aa This is your first section. You can add as much text as you like and structure it as you wish. In thisÂ post, well show you what options you have with Meminto!
Headings in continuous text are possible.

test Simply click on the six dots that appear to the left of your paragraph as soon as you have clicked on a word in this paragraph. You can then revise and optimise your text with Meminto AI. Just give it a try!
How about a picture in your text?

images.caption: There is also room for pictures in your book!

data.text: If you wish, you can also display two images in one line:
You also have the option "Record and transcribe audio". To do this, click on the microphone icon at the bottom of the editor and then follow the steps.
Even YouTube videos can be embedded!
A QR code will appear at this point in your book, which can be scanned. As long as your video is available on YouTube, it will be playable from the book:
You can now delete this sample text. We wish you lots of fun with your Meminto book!
